name: Sly Kittens!
description:
Featured by Apple! (see details below)
Awesome new "three in a row" game!

Funniest puzzle game ever, thanks to cute and funny game characters - Sly Kittiens!
Have fun and develop logical thinking at the same time!

Relax and get your daily portion of positive emotions!

Features:
- Enough Kittens to make you smile!
- One minute to learn how to play!
- Develops logical thinking!
- Well known gameplay!
- Awesome animation!
- For any age! ( "4+")
- Challenge friends!
- Lovely music!

Parents!
This app is a great way to make your kids to sit quietly!

Kids!
This app is the best way to make your parents sit quietly!



This game was featured by Apple in "New apps we love" and "New and buzzworthy" in App Store in Russia in July and August 2016. In the same time period Sly Kittens! Merged cats get angry! reached 28th position in Games in Russian App Store.
